Html:
Hi,seems the Oculus Rift DK2 is not supported yet. At least i wasn't able to kick it in for tracking the VR Player.



Any info around ?

Regards,
Frank
yesï¼Œ it did not support dk2 yet. i rewrite RiftWrapper.dll to support dk2.

You then need to download the DK2 Tracker:
How To Watch Movies On The Oculus Rift Development Kit 2 DK2
